name: cozy days daisy blanket
notes:
crochet this beautiful chunky daisy blanket to brighten up your home! this granny square blanket works up quickly using bulky level 5 yarn. choose your favorite color combinations to customize your blanket!  

the cozy days daisy blanket uses 11 skeins of hue + me yarn by lion brand yarn: 7 skeins of the main color (agave), 3 skeins of the petal color (salt) and 1 skein of the center daisy color (mustard).  there is a kit available for purchase through the lion brand yarn website. 

the **free** crochet pattern can be found on my blog **[here][1]**.  note that the printable pdf for purchase is a total of 7 pages including the cover page, step-by-step pictures and full pattern.  

there is also a full video tutorial available showing how to crochet the daisy granny square.  you can find this video embedded in my blog post or on my youtube channel [**here**][2]!

if you love this chunky blanket, be sure to check out the **baby version** using worsted weight yarn [**here**][3]!


  [1]: https://www.allaboutami.com/cozy-days-daisy-blanket/
  [2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=htxf4ilp9xs&t=9s
  [3]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/baby-cozy-days-daisy-blanket
